messages.content: i want to walkin tanger old city

For a private and guided walking tour in Tangier's Old City, you can choose from various options ranging from $40 to $60 per adult. These tours offer insights into the history and culture of Tangier, taking you through bustling markets, traditional shops, and the charming Medina.
give me a plan activity for 3 days please

Sure, could you please let me know your travel interests, the time of year you plan to visit, and if you have any budget constraints? This information will help me tailor the itinerary to suit your preferences.
yes just around food and walking in city
Sure, I will provide you with a detailed itinerary focusing on food and walking in the city. Let's start planning!
